raw_body:
KALUARACHCHI (KALU) – Dr BUDDHADASA – Loving father of Nilani Kaluarachchi Kanag-Isvaran,​ father-in-law of Shivaan Kanag-Isvaran,​ dearly beloved grandfather of Nirvaan & Nivaanya,​ passed away peacefully at home on 7th of March 2024. His remains will lie at “The Restpect Home” Jayaratne,​ Borella from 4 p.m. onwards on (Saturday) 9th of March 2024 for viewing. Cremation will take place on the 10th of March 2024 at 4.30 p.m. at the New Crematorium,​ Borella.
017595
